item.description:
Come join us for two of the greatest things on the planet - Mexican food and trivia challenges.

This will be a team event (we all talk together to figure out the correct answers). Best of all, we'll be competing for prizes ranging from free drinks to free food to free bar stuff.

Topics range from cartoons to Australian animals. Everyone knows something, so join us and help out!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the back bar or call me at 508-414-8544 if you cant find us.
item.name: Trivia Night at Perro Salado!
